thread.title: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair?
thread.title_full: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair?

title: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair?
text: Did your science fair project follow the rules of competition, or did it enter a moral gray area so ambiguous that the laws of ethics no longer applied? Take the quiz to find out! 1. Check off all the ways your science fair project violated the rules of the science fair: Used way more fetal tissue than the allowed 3 ounces. Failed to meet the ethical requirement of not conducting electricity through a live lobster. Built a John Lennon robot that only killed birds and refused to play music. Conclusively proved that global warming was entirely caused by the principal’s butt. Caused all of the owls on Earth to get wet. Showed bare midriff. Was just a glossy photo of the Hadron Collider. Contained far too many specific references to science teacher’s condo. When I depicted the principal and his family at the base of my baking soda volcano, he was clearly abandoning them to save himself. Showed time was circular and, in effect, plagiarized itself. Created a wormhole that sucked in two Gulf War veterans. Was just one small wet bean. Permanently melded the school’s mascot with its costume. Grew a plant using sunlight without crediting God for it. Tried to pass off Newton’s theory of gravity as my own original work. Outside assistance was used to finally kill it. Get results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair? Your Science Fair Project Violated A Disturbing Number Of The Science Fair’s Rules Wow, when it comes to the ethics behind your science fair project, it was an absolute moral clusterfuck. Not only did you violate nearly every rule of the science fair, but you also likely violated several federal laws as well, seeing as you’re not in jail for some of these offenses. Seems like you’re the wrong type of science prodigy. Yikes. Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair? Your Science Fair Project Violated Only A Few Of The Science Fair’s Rules! Nice! When it comes to violating the science fair’s rules, it looks like you were very tasteful! It’s not like you tried to reanimate your teacher’s dead wife or shoot your class pet into the ocean with a homemade catapult or something. You’re not perfect, but you’re definitely not a monster either! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did Your Science Fair Project Violate The Rules Of The Science Fair? Your Science Fair Project Violated None Of The Science Fair’s Rules! You goody-two-shoes. You kissass. You didn’t even have the stones to violate a single one of the science fair’s rules? What a pussy. Thank god you’re too old to participate in science fairs now, because you wouldn’t invent anything that’s any fun anyways.
